title: Best of The Herd: 09/05/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/05/2019
description:
Colin says in the history of the NFL the QBs who stick to the script tend to win more than the QBs like Aaron Rodgers who prefer to make it up as they go.  There is breaking news during the show that the Raiders will be potentially suspending Antonio Brown after an altercation with their GM and Colin talks about it with former WR TJ Houshmandzadeh.  Plus, Greg Cosell of NFL Films talks Bears/Packers ahead of the NFL's opening game 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
